events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and the resume looks promising with relevant experience.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on keywords such as software developer and backend engineer found in the candidate profile.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process and ensure smooth communication.
Completed the initial screening call where the candidate demonstrated strong understanding of software development principles and relevant technologies.
Candidate has responded enthusiastically to proceed with the technical assessment and has confirmed availability for the upcoming interview slots.
The technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering panel for next Monday at 10 AM to evaluate coding and problem-solving skills.
Candidate successfully completed the technical interview with strong performance in system design and algorithm questions.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture fit and compensation details following the successful technical round.
The HR interview has been completed with positive feedback on candidateâ€™s motivations and alignment with company values.
An official offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary package and benefits reflecting the market standards for the engineering role.
The candidate has provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join the team, requesting next steps clarification.
Candidate formally accepted the offer and confirmed their start date as agreed, marking a successful conclusion to the recruitment process.
The onboarding process has started with the candidate completing required documentation and attending orientation sessions remotely.
Recruitment process has been officially closed following successful onboarding of the new software engineer into the development team.
